DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect warm , humidified carbon dioxide Insufflation v standard carbon dioxide laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Warmed , Humidified Carbon Dioxide Insufflation v Standard Carbon Dioxide Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergo warm , humidified carbon dioxide ( CO2 ) insufflation laparoscopic cholecystectomy less postoperative pain patient undergo laparoscopic cholecystectomy standard CO2 insufflation . The study design double-blind , prospective , randomize study compare patient undergo laparoscopic cholecystectomy standard CO2 insufflation v receiving warm , humidify CO2 . Main variable include postoperative pain ( rat visual analog scale ) analgesic requirement .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis cholecystolithiasis Clinical diagnosis cholecystolithiasis cholecystitis
